export const invalidateQueries={// Invalidate all position-related queries

syncPositions:()=>{queryClient.refetchQueries({queryKey:queryKeys.positions.all,type:'active'});},syncInterviews:()=>{queryClient.refetchQueries({queryKey:queryKeys.interviews.all,type:'active'});},syncStatistics:()=>{queryClient.refetchQueries({queryKey:queryKeys.statistics.all,type:'active'});}};export default queryClient;
